text: Kristina Marie Gluesenkamp Pérez (née Pérez; born June 6, 1988) is an American politician and small business owner. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She is the U.S. representative for Washington's 3rd congressional district since 2023. ==References== Category:1980s births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Washington Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Washington (state)
title: Marie Gluesenkamp Perez
